entry.title: LGU Milagros introduces LIKAY to Barangay Captains

link.title: LGU Milagros introduces LIKAY to Barangay Captains

entry.title: LIKAY launches in LGU Milagros!
entry.content:
We are proud to announce that we have begun our roll out with LGU Milagros!

For the past few weeks, we have been in collaboration with the local government of Milagros, Masbate. The LGU has generously supported us with their time and resources to get the app up and ready. Since last week, the app has undergone successful dry-runs within the Municipalityâ€™s offices.

Further roll outs throughout the municipality will be done in the succeeding weeks! Stay tuned!
entry.summary: We are proud to announce that we have begun our roll out with LGU Milagros!
